# parts

**Instance Property**

An array of the individual components of a complete bind path.

## Declaration

```swift
var parts: [BindPath.Part] { get }
```

## Composing a property identifier

- **BindPath.Part**: An individual piece of a larger path that refers to the target of an animation.

items.description: An individual piece of a larger path that refers to the target of an animation.
items.name: BindPath.Part
